boardgame.name: Necromunda
Necromunda: Underhive
boardgame.description: Another classic game from Games Workshop's designers, which involves small gangs fighting for supremacy in the hive underworld. It allows for advance of the gangs as more games are played, as they gain more skills, money, and of course weapons to help them become the rulers of the Under Hive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In short: a futuristic miniature skirmish game with a well made campaign system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Necromunda: Underhive â€“ Van Saar Gang Cards

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ***This is for figures and books only*** ***Not a complete game*** *Approx 50 Figures (all in various stages of paint-from none to some): 17 Orlocks 17 Goliaths 10 Adeptus Aribites 2 Cawdor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s (in blister packs still) And I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m unsure about these, but I think the remaining 6 are: 2 Brethren 4 Cultists *Books: Outlanders Rulebook 2 Necromunda Rulebooks Necromunda Sourcebook No box for game
Necromunda BATTLES IN THE UNDERHIVE supplement 40k OOP This is for this book only. Game is not included with this purchase.
Auction win for Jeff Sharp (jsharp), please do not purchase unless you are Jeff.
Necromunda hardcover rulebook, used and in good condition.

Two different lots, either are for sale for $40. ot #1: Collection of Necromunda printed materials. Softbound editions of: Necromunda rulebook (copyright 1995); Necromunda Sourcebook (copyright 1995); Outlanders Rulebook (copyright 1996) and Necromunda Underhive (copyright 2003). The Underhive book is in very good/lightly read condition. The other three items from the 1990s are well thumped with coverwear. Each of the latter items has an owners name written on the inside cover. Lot #2: A box of Necromunda Delaque gang. copyright 1995. There are nine figures here, with 8 in their stands and either primed (4) or reasonably well painted (4). The 9th miniature does not have a stand and is unprimed. There are a modest number of unused weapons on a sprue.

One Bolt-Pistol Goliath-Ganger Arm missing, BUT also includes 2 Spyre Hunters not normally in the Box! Also included: Eldar Exarchs Maugan Ra, Striking Scorpions and Warp Spider Exarchs! Components in very good condition. All components checked and sorted. All of the plastic min._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s are unpainted! Box Corners show wear and tear, but the box itself is intact. Shipped via insured DHL Business Service from Germany. Ships in strong carton, with shockabsorbing filling. All game materials are present (rulebooks, minis, scenography, game counters, templates....)and in perfect conditions but the box has some damages. I played it once or twice.

Language: english Publisher: GW (Games Workshop) Game Condition: Never Played Box Condition: Minor Wear, Repaired Corners Notes: See Description Availability: Now Available ID Gis: 29164 (for reference)
